title: Best of the Program | Guests: Ethan Nordean & Josh Hammer | 6/8/22
description:
Glenn predicts that the Biden administration will soon be using climate change to excuse all America's problems and will use it to seize more power. Glenn talks with Ethan Nordean who's been in prison for over a year for his participation on January 6 and is now facing sedition charges. Opinion editor for Newsweek Josh Hammer joins to discuss the story of a man who was arrested after he went to Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh's house with the intent to kill him.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
